replies.body: Can Camille even reproduce with those augments? :l
She is 80-90 years old. I doubt it. If you have this theory because of her voice lines, she's old, so bound to know things.

she said "it's like looking at a boorish mirror" and "watch it girl, i am your future." to Vi and she seems to hint to be C as well since, she hints to have allowed Jinx to go on a rampage and that she warns caitlyn to stop snooping

Camille saying things like that doesn't necessarily mean much.

For Vi, Vi's gauntlets can very much be equated with whatever upgrades Camille has, meaning saying it's like looking into a boorish mirror/i am your future makes sense without her being Vi's mother

>It was her dedication to duty that led the Steel Shadow to transfigure her body into a hextech-powered death machine.

The fact that she is a Hextech powered Death machine relates to Vi on levels other than blood (or at least blood heritage, they both cause a lot of actual blood).

As for Jinx, remember what Camille want's isn't necessarily for Jinx to stop, she is cold and calculating, and clearly doesn't see jinx as a threat, and jinx probably does some decent good even without realizing it, at least for Camille's purposes, considering we don't know 100% about her, it is safe to say that she could easily have some sort of alignment that makes Jinx doing what she does OK for her/her group.

Yeah this. I don't trust player theories, because they are always usually horribly wrong, like that one where they thought there was gonna be Yasuo's brother out with a Project skin. If we're gonna start weird theories, then I'm just gonna say that Jayce is related to Camille because her family stole crystals from the Brackern and Jayce is on Skarner's page for reasons unknown, so is he continuing his family's work or something?

Also, Camille was augmented at 25, can she even have kids with those robo legs? I haven't looked at her much, but if they are just robo legs that pop off, then I guess should have been fine, skimming through the latest lore page she has a hextech heart? and I see on her splashart she has robot eyes? She doesn't seem very human anymore. If you say she had a baby before 25, that's gonna make Vi way over 30 years old seeing as Camille is 80-90 right now.

That being said, she does seem like the type that would dump her kid at an orphanage because she doesn't have time for he/she.
